SETTINGS.sentToChatHint: If disabled, notification will be used instead.
SETTINGS.showNPCBelowSuperiorityHint: Works only when `Send to Chat?` enabled. Will display clickable tokens of Troops whose Resolve is equal to or lower than Superiority. Doesn't count Elites or Leaders.
SETTINGS.chatVisibilityHint: Works only when `Send to Chat?` enabled.

MESSAGES.troopsWithLowerResolve: Troops with Resolve equal to or lower than Superiority
